name: ReCycle 1.x Document
summary: Learn about .RCY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ReCycle no longer saves audio documents as RCY files. However, newer versions of the program can still open older documents.

description: Audio data file created by ReCycle 1.x, a program used to create audio sample loops; contains the audio data in slices, which can be stretched to match specific tempos; used for storing audio sample work.
